rules_text: [+1]: You may have Aurra Sing deal 2 damage to target creature. If you don't, Aurra Sing deals 1 damage to you. [-4]: Target player gets an emblem with “Whenever a nontoken creature you control leaves the battlefield, discard a card.” [-6]: Each player discards his or her hand and exiles all creatures he or she controls. Each player's life total becomes 1.
special_text:
[+1]: Put a bounty counter on target creature, battle, or planeswalker. Aurra Sing, Bane of Jedi deals 2 damage to that permanent and 1 damage to you.
[-X]: Return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste until end of turn.
[-5]: Target opponent gets an emblem with “Whenever a nontoken creature you control leaves the battlefield, discard a card.”
